plugin.name: Redirects
general.form.errors.url: Field should be a relative or absolute url.
general.form.errors.relativeUrl: Field should be a relative url.
general.form.errors.duplicate: Field may not be the same as ''{field}''.

overview.help.title: How does import work?
overview.help.instructions: Upload a csv file, with the following columns:
modal.import.title: Import redirects
modal.import.description: This import process checks each redirect. If a redirect with the same 'From' URL exists, it will be updated with the new 'To' URL. Redirects not existing in the system will be created. Entries that are duplicates within the import file or lead to potential redirection loops will be skipped to ensure data integrity.
modal.import.dragAndDrop: Drag & drop your file into this area or browse for a file to upload
modal.import.partial.title: Import complete with observations
modal.import.partial.description: The import has finished, and we've cross-checked your redirects against existing data. Only error-free entries have been added. We identified some redirects with potential issues that were not imported. Please review the flagged redirects for any necessary corrections. Your redirects remains clean and free of duplicates or loops.
modal.import.partial.message: Some data failed to be imported. This is most likely due to duplicate redirects. Please check the log for more information.
modal.import.success.message: Your data has been imported successfully.
modal.import.error.message: An unexpected error occured while importing your data.
detail.header.title: Edit redirect
detail.form.from.label: Old URL
detail.form.to.label: New URL
detail.form.type.label: Type
detail.form.submit.title: Save
detail.form.submit.new.title: Save and new
detail.form.type.value.moved_permanently: 301 Moved Permanent: The resource has moved permanently to a new URL.
detail.form.type.value.found_302.descrip: 302 Temporary The resource is temporarily located at a different URL.
detail.form.type.value.temporary_redirec: 307 Found Temporarily moved to a new URL with the same method used.
detail.form.type.value.gone_410.descript: 410 Gone The resource is permanently removed and won't be available again.
detail.form.type.value.unavailable_for_l: 451 Unavailable For Legal Reasons Access to the resource is restricted due to legal reasons.
Duplicate redirect. Redirect with the same 'From' field already exists.
detail.form.save.notify.error.LOOP.messa: Redirect will cause a loop. The given 'To' field will eventually loop back to the 'From' field.
